title: Ukraine Leader Finds Himself Thrust Into U.S. Politics Following Trump Call
text:
MOSCOW—Four months into his first job in politics, Ukraine’s new leader has been thrust into the middle of a partisan fight in the U.S., one of his country’s most important backers financially and politically.

At the center of the fight is a call that Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky held with President Trump in July, shortly after the former comedian’s party won a commanding victory in parliamentary elections. During the call, The Wall Street Journal reported, Mr. Trump repeatedly pressured Mr. Zelensky to investigate...
description: Ukraine’s new leader, a former comedian who never held office before, is now in the middle of a partisan battle in the U.S., one of his country’s most important backers.
